name: Dotted Hero
description:
You are playing the little mushroom Dot who is trying to collect some berrys in his home, the forest. Everything seems fine until you witness a atomic bomb drop which leads you to onto the mission of trying to save the nature.

Features:

  • 3 different Level (Forest, Cave, Wasteland)
  • 2 Hat mechanics Like gliding and boomerang
  • 3 different Pickups (Blueberry, Shrooms, Saplings)
  • Cutscenes
